meanings.sent1: The composters in our community garden are very dedicated.
meanings.sent2: I learned a lot about composting from experienced composters.
meanings.sent3: The composters had a friendly competition to see who could make the best compost.
meanings.sent4: She was a magician with organic waste, like a group of composters turning scraps into gold.
meanings.sent5: The composters worked tirelessly to create nutrient-rich soil for the plants.

meanings.definition: A device used for composting organic material.
meanings.sent1: The composters in the backyard are helping to reduce waste.
meanings.sent2: We bought new composters to improve our garden's soil quality.
meanings.sent3: The composters were chatting among themselves about the latest organic materials they received.
meanings.sent4: The composters hummed softly as they transformed kitchen scraps into valuable fertilizer.
meanings.sent5: The composters stood proudly, ready to turn food scraps into nutrient-rich soil.

meanings.sent1: Composting is a great way to reduce waste, and many people are becoming composters.
meanings.sent2: The composters in the park are always busy with their composting activities.
meanings.sent3: The composters decided to have a composting party to celebrate Earth Day.
meanings.sent4: The composters worked together like a well-oiled machine, efficiently composting organic matter.
meanings.sent5: The composters filled the air with the earthy scent of decomposing materials as they composted.
